column5: We drove out in the morning and condtions were fantastic witha small amount of snow for good traction--walking was good for those who walked---look at my last post for Saturday/Sunday for driving out---you might get out but not in---The ramps are taking a beating and the ice is starting the changing stage--with some mild temps--won't take long to get rotten ice-  good luck  simcoebob
AH very nice, iam thinking of heading out sunday morn , ive being craving smoked white fish with a chees ball and crackers! good going
Great report and pic BOB  Beauty whites Thanks for sharing Leechman
nice going I hope to get out Saturday
Great stuff!  I'm heading out for one last stab at Simcoe tomorrow!  Hoping to catch at least one fish through the ice this year!

Cliff bring a chainsaw cut a 4 X 4 hole and voila no problem pulling the fish through the ice.  I am counting on you to be successful saturday I feel it .Your time has come now break a leg  Nice whities Mr Bob

Be careful!! Like SImcobob said, you might get out in the morning but you may not get back in the afternoon off the lake. We nearly sunk our ATV today in some slushy water. Good luck fishing. The ice on the lake is still great and the fishing is too.  Enjoy.
Ya that is true try to walk not drive.
